name: Format\Audio
description: The component for adding a playable audio clip.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of an audio file (http or https only). This component supports all AVPlayer audio formats, including the following:

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: A caption that describes the content of the audio file. Note that this property differs from caption: although the caption can be displayed to users, the accessibilityCaption is used by VoiceOver for iOS only. If accessibilityCaption is omitted, the caption value is used for VoiceOver for iOS.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A caption that describes the content of the audio file. This text can be used by VoiceOver for iOS if accessibilityCaption is not provided, or it can be shown when the audio cannot be played.

properties.name: explicitContent
properties.description: Indicates that the audio may contain explicit content.

properties.name: imageURL
properties.description: The URL of an image file that represents the audio file, such as a cover image.

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of audio.
